rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0001
rows.name:
Masterpon was in good mood today.
Talked with Hana 16 times.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0002
rows.name:
Also, Hana talked with
Homura 31 times...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0003
rows.name: What are you doing, Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0004
rows.name: Kagutsuchi... Hana is keeping a diary.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0005
rows.name:
Hana has decided to keep
records like Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0006
rows.name:
But Hana, you don't return to a Core
Crystal like we do, so you're not at
risk of losing your memories, are you?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0007
rows.name:
Hana's body is full of delicate stuff.
If Hana's head gets damaged in battle,
Hana might lose her memory.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, I understand... Your body
seems practical but comes
with its own challenges.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0009
rows.name:
Yes, Hana is the world's
most difficult-to-handle
girl with a selfish body.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0010
rows.name:
"Selfish body"... I see,
that's also something Tora
put in your head...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0011
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0012
rows.name:
Why does Kagutsuchi care so much
about keeping records of the past?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0014
rows.name:
Hana has started a diary too, but
I'm not quite sure what to write,
so I'd like you to tell me.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0015
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0016
rows.name: I don't want to lose who I am...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0017
rows.name:
It's because I want to
remain who I am...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0101
rows.name:
Without a diary, Kagutsuchi
will disappear?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0102
rows.name:
But even if Kagutsuchi returns to
her Core, wouldn't you come back
when resonated with a new Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0103
rows.name: But is that really true?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0104
rows.name:
If I return to my Core Crystal
and a very long time passes...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0105
rows.name:
All the people who know me
would eventually be gone.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0106
rows.name:
If the Kagutsuchi who lived through
that time no longer exists in my
memories or the memories of others...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0107
rows.name:
Who's to say that I existed
in that time at all?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0108
rows.name: Hmmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0109
rows.name:
You're right, it would be impossible
to prove that Kagutsuchi existed.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0110
rows.name:
Exactly. If no one knows
about me, it's as though
I never existed at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0111
rows.name: You know, that made me feel lonely.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0112
rows.name:
Because the time spent
living with important
people has shaped who I am.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0113
rows.name:
Both happy memories and sad
memories, all of them together,
make up who I am...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0114
rows.name:
To lose all that would be like denying
the existence of both myself and the
people I cared about during that time.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0115
rows.name:
Masterpon has taught Hana
so many things. Hana would
hate to forget all that.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0116
rows.name:
Everything about Masterpon
is packed inside Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0117
rows.name:
Exactly. That's why a diary
filled with memories is such
a precious treasure.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0118
rows.name:
It forms a vital link between
you, the people in your life,
and the world you live in.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0119
rows.name:
I understand! Hana will also
do her best to keep a diary!

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0120
rows.name:
Hana will make lots of memories
together with Kagutsuchi and everyone!

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0121
rows.name:
Yes, indeed. Let's create
plenty of memories together.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0201
rows.name: Mo-mo?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0202
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi is Kagutsuchi,
right? Not anyone else?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0203
rows.name:
Let's say, for instance, that Hana
forgot all memories of Tora and started
calling someone else Masterpon...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0204
rows.name:
Do you think that new Hana
would be the same as the
Hana who was with Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0205
rows.name: Hmmmm... Hana is Hana...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0206
rows.name:
...But that Hana would be a Hana
working for a new Masterpon,
different from the current Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0207
rows.name:
That Hana probably wouldn't
even wear frilly maid outfits.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0208
rows.name:
W-well, maid outfits aside,
you've got the right idea.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0209
rows.name:
While every version of me is still
"me", they're really separate
Kagutsuchis living in different eras.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0210
rows.name:
My existence isn't a continuous,
unbroken thread through time.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0211
rows.name: I see, I understand now.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0212
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi wants to stay the same
Kagutsuchi forever, so Kagutsuchi
keeps a diary of everything.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0213
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0214
rows.name:
Even if I return to my Core
Crystal and lose my memories...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0215
rows.name:
With the diary, the next
Kagutsuchi can continue to be me.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0216
rows.name:
Though this is only possible because
the Superbia Empire faithfully preserves
and passes down my diary...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0217
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi... What would be the best
way to pass down Hana's diary?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0218
rows.name: Leaving it to Tora seems... risky.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0219
rows.name:
Masterpon might use it as a pillow
for naps or as a pot stand...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0220
rows.name:
We'll need to figure out a good
system for preserving your diary...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0221
rows.name:
Making sure Hana's daily
diary entries don't go to
waste seems challenging...
